name: .ISM File Extension
summary: Learn about .ISM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by InstallShield, a program used to create Windows installers; contains all project settings and code, including directory structures, file names, custom scripts, and installer dialog settings; used to build an installation package.

content: ISM files can be saved in either a binary format or an XML format.
NOTE: ISM files are created by the Premiere and Professional editions of InstallShield.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
